books.name: Venusaur
books.evolution: Venusaur evolves from Ivysaur at level 32. It can mega evolve into Mega Venusaur using the Venusaurite.

books.name: Charizard
books.evolution: Charizard evolves from Charmeleon starting at level 36. It is the final form of Charmander.

books.name: Butterfree
books.evolution: Butterfree evolves from Metapod at level 10 and is the final evolution of Caterpie.

books.name: Beedrill
books.evolution: Beedrill is the final evolution of Weedle and evolves from Kakuna at level 10. Beedrill gains a Mega Evolution in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.

books.name: Fearow
books.evolution: Fearow evolves from Spearow at level 20.

books.name: Nidoqueen
books.evolution: Nidoqueen is the evolved form of a Nidorina by use of a Moon Stone, and is the final form of a Nidoran.

books.name: Venomoth
books.evolution: Venomoth is the evolved form of Venonat as of level 31.

books.name: Wigglytuff
books.evolution: Wigglytuff is the evolved form of Jigglypuff by the use of a Moon Stone. Wigglytuff is the final form of Igglybuff.

books.name: Jynx
books.evolution: Jynx is the evolved form of Smoochum as of level 30.
